EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.Generic_Live_IHS_Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: How can Secure Service Enablement help your network?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Make your network simpler, agile and more secure As a key decision maker in your company, you are concerned about how moving to IMS and VoLTE will impact your network’s security, performance, and reliability. Join our webinar with IHS on Tuesday September 19th and discover how Secure Service Enablement (SSE) can help you:
- Boost network reliability and performance
- Make your network as profitable as possible
- Gain agility for the future Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
